import { useMemo, useState } from 'react' import './AddOn.css' function AddOn({ state, dispatch }) { const [toggle, setToggle] = useState({ online: false, storage: false, profile:false }) function handleOnline() { setToggle({ online: !toggle.online }) toggle.online&&dispatch({type:"OnlineCheckAddOn"}) } const check = useMemo(() => setToggle({ online: !toggle.online }), [toggle.online]) console.log(check) return (

Pick add-ons

Add-ons help enhance your gaming experience.

) } export default AddOn
